languages.text: "Теперь к менее глобальным вопросам. В столице чувствуется напряженность, связанная с нетипичным преемничеством священного {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g}. Разумеется, угроза восстания минимальная, а распускание слухов — лишь следствие слабости ума и духа. И все же... у меня есть список малых домов, что проявляли неподобающее волнение в связи с вашим назначением. Как прикажете с ними поступить?"

traits.locale_text: "Теперь к менее глобальным вопросам. В столице чувствуется напряженность, связанная с нетипичным преемничеством священного Патента. Разумеется, угроза восстания минимальная, а распускание слухов — лишь следствие слабости ума и духа. И все же... у меня есть список малых домов, что проявляли неподобающее волнение в связи с вашим назначением. Как прикажете с ними поступить?"

languages.text: "Now, to issues on a smaller scale. There is a certain degree of tension in the capital due to the unorthodox succession to the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. Chances of uprisings are minimal, of course, and the spreading of rumours is nothing but a sign of weakness of mind and spirit. Nonetheless... I have prepared a list of minor houses that have demonstrated unseemly discomposure at your succession. What is to be done about them?"
languages.original_text: "Теперь к менее глобальным вопросам. В столице чувствуется напряженность, связанная с нетипичным преемничеством священного {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g}. Разумеется, угроза восстания минимальная, а распускание слухов — лишь следствие слабости ума и духа. И все же... у меня есть список малых домов, что проявляли неподобающее волнение в связи с вашим назначением. Как прикажете с ними поступить?"

traits.locale_text: "Now, to issues on a smaller scale. There is a certain degree of tension in the capital due to the unorthodox succession to the sacred Warrant. Chances of uprising are minimal, of course, and these spreading rumors are nothing but a sign of weakness of mind and spirit. Nonetheless... I have prepared a list of minor houses that have demonstrated improper discomposure at your induction. What is to be done about them?"

"Now, to issues on a smaller scale. There is a certain degree of tension in the capital due to the unorthodox succession to the sacred Warrant. Chances of uprising are minimal, of course, and these spreading rumors are nothing but a sign of weakness of mind and spirit. Nonetheless... I have prepared a list of minor houses that have demonstrated improper discomposure at your induction. What is to be done about them?"

"Now, to issues on a smaller scale. There is a certain degree of tension in the capital due to the unorthodox succession to the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. Chances of uprisings are minimal, of course, and the spreading of rumours is nothing but a sign of weakness of mind and spirit. Nonetheless... I have prepared a list of minor houses that have demonstrated unseemly discomposure at your succession. What is to be done about them?"

"Now, to issues on a smaller scale. There is a certain degree of tension in the capital due to the unorthodox succession to the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. Chances of uprisings are minimal, of course, and the spreading of rumours is nothing but a sign of weakness of mind and spirit. Nonetheless... I have prepared a list of minor houses that have demonstrated unseemly discomposure at your succession. What is to be done about them?"

"Now, to issues on a smaller scale. There is a certain degree of tension in the capital due to the unorthodox succession to the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. Chances of uprisings are minimal, of course, and the spreading of rumours is nothing but a sign of weakness of mind and spirit. Nonetheless... I have prepared a list of minor houses that have demonstrated unseemly discomposure at your succession. What is to be done about them?"

languages.text: “现在，我再来说说小范围内的问题吧。由于神圣的{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}授状{/g}的继承方式并非正统，首都中出现了一定的紧张情绪。当然，爆发叛乱的可能性非常低，散布谣言也只不过是精神与思想软弱的表现。但尽管如此……我准备了一份次要家族的名单，他们对您继任的事实表现出了不体面、不冷静的态度。您准备如何处理他们？”
languages.original_text: "Now, to issues on a smaller scale. There is a certain degree of tension in the capital due to the unorthodox succession to the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. Chances of uprisings are minimal, of course, and the spreading of rumours is nothing but a sign of weakness of mind and spirit. Nonetheless... I have prepared a list of minor houses that have demonstrated unseemly discomposure at your succession. What is to be done about them?"

traits.locale_text: “现在，我再来说说小范围内的问题吧。由于神圣的{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}许可证{/g}的继承方式并非正统，首都中出现了一定的紧张情绪。当然，爆发叛乱的可能性非常低，散布谣言也只不过是精神与思想软弱的表现。但尽管如此……我准备了一份次要家族的名单，他们对您继任的事实表现出了不体面、不冷静的态度。您准备如何处理他们？”

languages.text: «Pasemos a asuntos de menor escala. Hay cierto nivel de tensión en la capital debido a las formas poco ortodoxas de la sucesión de la sagrada {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}. Es cierto que las probabilidades de una revuelta son mínimas y que la propagación de rumores es muestra de debilidad en mente y espíritu, pero... he preparado una lista de casas menores que han demostrado una falta de compostura improcedente ante su sucesión. ¿Qué hacemos al respecto?».
languages.original_text: "Now, to issues on a smaller scale. There is a certain degree of tension in the capital due to the unorthodox succession to the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. Chances of uprisings are minimal, of course, and the spreading of rumours is nothing but a sign of weakness of mind and spirit. Nonetheless... I have prepared a list of minor houses that have demonstrated unseemly discomposure at your succession. What is to be done about them?"

traits.locale_text: «Pasemos a asuntos de menor escala. Hay cierto nivel de tensión en la capital debido a las formas poco ortodoxas de la sucesión de la sagrada {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}. Es cierto que las probabilidades de una revuelta son mínimas y que la propagación de rumores es muestra de debilidad en mente y espíritu, pero... he preparado una lista de casas menores que han demostrado una falta de compostura improcedente ante su sucesión. ¿Qué hacemos al respecto?».

languages.text: 「さて、些細な問題についてもお伝えします。聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}の異例な継承により、首都に一種の緊張感が漂っています。暴動が起きる可能性は限りなく低く、噂が流布するのは心や精神の弱さの表れでしかありません。ですが…陛下の継承を快く思わない、取るに足らない一族の一覧を作成しました。この者たちはいかがなさいますか？」
languages.original_text: "Now, to issues on a smaller scale. There is a certain degree of tension in the capital due to the unorthodox succession to the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. Chances of uprisings are minimal, of course, and the spreading of rumours is nothing but a sign of weakness of mind and spirit. Nonetheless... I have prepared a list of minor houses that have demonstrated unseemly discomposure at your succession. What is to be done about them?"

traits.locale_text: 「さて、些細な問題についてもお伝えします。聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}の異例な継承により、首都に一種の緊張感が漂っています。暴動が起きる可能性は限りなく低く、噂が流布するのは心や精神の弱さの表れでしかありません。ですが…陛下の継承を快く思わない、取るに足らない一族の一覧を作成しました。この者たちはいかがなさいますか？」

languages.text: "Kommen wir nun zu kleineren Problemen. In der Hauptstadt gibt es gewisse Spannungen bezüglich der unorthodoxen Nachfolge beim heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g}. Die Wahrscheinlichkeit von Aufständen ist natürlich minimal, und die Gerüchte sind nur ein Zeichen der Schwäche von Verstand und Geist. Dennoch ... habe ich eine Liste kleinerer Häuser erstellt, die angesichts Eurer Nachfolge eine unziemliche Unruhe an den Tag gelegt haben. Was soll mit ihnen geschehen?"
languages.original_text: "Now, to issues on a smaller scale. There is a certain degree of tension in the capital due to the unorthodox succession to the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. Chances of uprisings are minimal, of course, and the spreading of rumours is nothing but a sign of weakness of mind and spirit. Nonetheless... I have prepared a list of minor houses that have demonstrated unseemly discomposure at your succession. What is to be done about them?"

traits.locale_text: "Kommen wir nun zu kleineren Problemen. In der Hauptstadt gibt es gewisse Spannungen bezüglich der unorthodoxen Nachfolge beim heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g}. Die Wahrscheinlichkeit von Aufständen ist natürlich minimal, und die Gerüchte sind nur ein Zeichen der Schwäche von Verstand und Geist. Dennoch ... habe ich eine Liste kleinerer Häuser erstellt, die angesichts Eurer Nachfolge eine unziemliche Unruhe an den Tag gelegt haben. Was soll mit ihnen geschehen?"

languages.text: « Permettez-moi maintenant d'aborder des problèmes d'envergure plus... modeste, dira-t-on. La transmission pour le moindre singulière de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} a provoqué quelques tensions dans la capitale. Bien entendu, les risques de révolte sont minimes, et les rumeurs qui courent le résultat d'esprits faibles et dérangés. Néanmoins... j'ai dressé la liste des maisons mineures qui ont montré une certaine agitation à l'annonce de votre succession. Que devons-nous faire à leur sujet ? »
languages.original_text: "Now, to issues on a smaller scale. There is a certain degree of tension in the capital due to the unorthodox succession to the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. Chances of uprisings are minimal, of course, and the spreading of rumours is nothing but a sign of weakness of mind and spirit. Nonetheless... I have prepared a list of minor houses that have demonstrated unseemly discomposure at your succession. What is to be done about them?"

traits.locale_text: « Permettez-moi maintenant d'aborder des problèmes d'envergure plus... modeste, dira-t-on. La transmission pour le moindre singulière de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} a provoqué quelques tensions dans la capitale. Bien entendu, les risques de révolte sont minimes, et les rumeurs qui courent le résultat d'esprits faibles et dérangés. Néanmoins... j'ai dressé la liste des maisons mineures qui ont montré une certaine agitation à l'annonce de votre succession. Que devons-nous faire à leur sujet ? »

languages.text: "Daha küçük çaplı sorunlara geçelim... Kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g}, olağan dışı bir şekilde el değiştirdiği için başkentte belli bir miktar gerilim mevcut. Ayaklanma ihtimali elbette son derece düşük, yayılan söylentiler de yayanların zihinsel ve ruhsal zayıflığından başka bir şey değil. Yine de yeni mevkiniz konusundaki rahatsızlıklarını hoş olmayan şekillerde gösteren küçük hanelerin bir listesini hazırladım. Onlara ne yapalım?"
languages.original_text: "Now, to issues on a smaller scale. There is a certain degree of tension in the capital due to the unorthodox succession to the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}. Chances of uprisings are minimal, of course, and the spreading of rumours is nothing but a sign of weakness of mind and spirit. Nonetheless... I have prepared a list of minor houses that have demonstrated unseemly discomposure at your succession. What is to be done about them?"

traits.locale_text: "Daha küçük çaplı sorunlara geçecek olursak: Kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g} olağan dışı bir şekilde el değiştirdiği için başkentte belli bir miktar gerilim mevcut. Ayaklanma ihtimali elbette son derece düşük ve bu yayılan söylentiler, yayanların zihinsel ve ruhsal zayıflığından başka bir şey değil. Yine de yeni mevkiniz konusundaki rahatsızlıklarını hoş olmayan şekillerde gösteren küçük hanelerin bir listesini hazırladım. Onlar hakkında ne yapalım?"
